title: We're hiring For Manager- Information Technology, Gurgaon
jobDescription:
We're hiring!


Position- Manager - IT

Location- Gurugram

Department-IT

JOB PURPOSE: Candidate to have the overall responsibility of IT in his/her working region. This includes: Team building, team management, L4 support, Vendor Management, New Projects Implementations

JOB DIMENSIONS:

Financial Data & Number of Staff Supervised:


Operating Budget / Revenues



KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:

The Candidate is required to:

Core:

  • Team Management
  • L4 Support
  • Integrity and Ethics
  • Reports building (SLA, Threats, IDS, IPS, etc)
  • RCA of issues
  • Vendors coordination
  • Fortigate + Sonicwall firewall

Generic:

  • Adaptability/Flexibility
  • Communication
  • Interpersonal Skills
  • Initiative
  • Leadership
  • Planning & Organizing
  • Team Building
  • Result Orientation
  • Problem Solving Skills
  • Experience in leading team of 10+ in previous experience / current
  • Making configuration changes to devices (Firewall / Load Balancer / Router / Switches / AP)

  • Implementation and maintenance of network architecture components for managed services, including OS installation hardening management, implementation, and maintenance of network monitoring toolsets

  • Administering TCP/IP addresses

  • Monitoring the network to determine capacity usage and escalate/ recommend necessary steps to Tele performance

  • Resolution of network faults within the time frame defined by the SLAs

  • Updating documentation of the LAN, like IP address register, PC IDs, Router configurations, hardware, network diagrams as and when changes happen.

  • Generating monthly reports on various Network related calls and uptimes

  • Planning, implementation, and configuration of monitoring and maintenance network hardware and telecommunications links, including routers, switches, IDS, load-balancing, etc for expansions of network

  • Establish and maintain a redundant network operations environment, including substantial software and hardware fail-over; monitoring and testing the configuration performance

  • Good Understanding of Routing and switching concepts.

  • Must have expertise in Remote Infrastructure management for network.

  • Hands-on experience in configuration and troubleshooting of firewall (Sonicwall), IDS/IPS, VPN, Zabbix or other monitoring tools

  • Perform day today firewall activities like Administration, Management, monitoring and troubleshooting

  • Good knowledge on F/W OS Upgrades and software strategies

  • Hands on experience in configuring URL filtering, file blocking and security profiles in firewalls

  • Review network security threat logs for intrusions and compromises and provide solutions

Day to day specifics:

  • Support to L3, L4
  • Daily Review of PAN India connectivity
  • Reports building (SLA/ link Utilization /Threats /VPN etc.)
  • Maintain/updates IT MIS reports as per the management requirement on day-to-day basis
  • RCA reports building
  • OPS Support, Inventory Management, Infrastructure, Projects Rollout, Team Management
  • COMMUNICATIONS & WORKING RELATIONSHIPS:

Internal:

  • Functional Teams
  • IT team
  • OPS Team

External:

  • Related Vendor / Partner

Educational Qualification: B.E / B.tech , BCA / MCA

Preferred: ITIL Certified candidates preferable


Certifications: Must done CCNA / CCNP, additional advantage SonicWall / Fortinet


Relative Work Experience: 8+ yrs of experience

  • Excellent communication skills
  • Drive to learn effectively with all IT team members, other department Support Teams, vendors and clients

Should be flexible to work in odd hours


Kindly share your CV to alice.m@ecomexpress.in

Subjectline- Application of Manager IT

jobDescription:
Title: R2R Operations Manager


Assigned Role:


- General Accounting Ops Practitioner


Operational:


- Understand client's business needs and ensure that processes are aligned


- Ensure that close process is completed in accurate and timely manner


- Perform high level review of both Balance Sheet and P&L for obvious errors, omissions, or inconsistencies


- Support Finance Controller to enable them to attest to accuracy of GL; Review and sign off all reconciliations in line with reconciliation policies & procedures


- Ensure compliance with Client's accounting policies


- Manage preparation of all statutory compliance documentation


- Engage with Finance Controllers (FC) on potential issues concerning compliance requirements


- Review all compliance documentation prior to submission to FC from accuracy and completeness


- Proactively assist in ensuring compliance with all statutory and statistical requirements in a geography


- Provide statutory and tax audit support;Respond in a timely manner to all requests from FC


- Work with leverages teams and ensures that SLAs are met ; Proactively escalate issues to the supervisor that require intervention/clarification


Financial: - Identify areas of cost reduction by process and productivity improvements Client/Customer


- Ensure compliance with client's policies and procedures


- Ensure timely communication to customers


- Create adequate back ups of all work products


- Develop an understanding of customer accounts and information


- Build flexibility and adaptability to ensure smooth service delivery.

title: Information Technology Manager

ambitionBoxData.Title: Pathfinder Management Consulting Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
The Regional IT Manager oversees the support and operation of the IT environment of multiple assigned locations within their region, to ensure critical systems and applications are available to support business operations, while maintaining a high degree of customer satisfaction.

Working with in-region IT staff, the Regional IT Manager ensures IT team is meeting service level agreement with organization. Responsible to keep the standard response and quality of service for all IT support and for trend analysis and well as monitor and administer IT teams work in the specified zone. The Regional IT Manager is also required to work directly with senior IT management in strategic planning and implementation of systems to support the mission.

Key Job Outcomes:

1. IT Team Project Management: Work with regional IT teams to attain set standards and objectives. Train and monitor local IT staff to maintain service levels. Coordinate application implementations and upgrades. Build and maintain relationships with all IT units to ensure that goals are understood and met. Build and maintain cohesive local IT teams.
2. IT Operations: Responsible for ensuring regional IT teams are giving proper support to end users. Identifying gaps in support or support consistency and developing gap-closing measures with Global Technology Manager.
3. Systems Administration: Administers and supports systems and country teams infrastructure in close coordination with Pathfinder s US Information Technology Unit and Pathfinder s global IT standards. Ensures timely backups of all necessary systems data is been performed. Ensures high standards of systems availability across a range of physical conditions as budgets allow. Coordinates with U.S. for disaster recovery planning. Support to implements LAN and WAN public and private networks in project Country offices.
4. User Systems: Supports IT Staff in zone, coordinate regionally all upgrades and maintenance software ensuring that all workstations are virus free, Repairs and troubleshoots hardware issues as needed.

5. IT Communications and Administration: Ensures timely coordination and communication of specific program requirements, needs and initiatives with Pathfinder US Information Systems Unit Director and Global IT Services Director. Coordinate with IT teams in region to follow up on ongoing country specific IT support to ensure SLA is being followed.
6. Information Systems: Works with Pathfinder U.S. for the development, implementation, training and support of Pathfinder worldwide systems, including intranet and knowledge management systems including: Microsoft Office 365, Serenic, DHIS2, and others.
7. Project Management and Participation: Leads, manages or participates in cross functional project teams.

8. Process Efficiencies: Identify and assists with projects automation, integration
and improvements to ensure efficient use of IT resources.

9. Vendor Relationship Management: Provides oversight and support to any outsourced or partnered business relationship. Identify potential vendors as needed.
10. Change Management: Provides appropriate change management practices to oversee the development, design and implementation of new processes, applications and changes to existing computers systems and software packages.

Minimally Required Education, Training and Experience:
Bachelor s degree in Computer Sciences, Information Technology or equivalent, or a combination of education and experience that yields the required competencies
5 years of hands on IT experience
3 years hands-on experience in Microsoft windows, server installations, configurations and active directory
2 years in service desk environment
2 years management experience
Prefer: Previous work experience with an international NGO

Minimally Required Job-Specific Competencies:
IT Administration: Foundational skills in administering a Microsoft server and virtualization environment using Windows 2016 and 2019 Server and Microsoft Hyper-V); public and private networks; communication systems, data management systems such as Microsoft Azure and Microsoft Office 365; and information systems, including telephone, online communications, and mobile devices.
IT Operations: Foundational knowledge of technologies, including LAN/WAN/VSAT/Wireless technologies, Switches, Firewalls, VPN, DNS, DHCP.
Computer Applications and Systems: Foundational knowledge. of Microsoft SharePoint, Dynamics and Office Suite. SPSS, ARCGIS, DocuSign and Adobe.
Troubleshooting: Ability to analyze, troubleshoot, support, and implement technical solutions at all levels, especially the desktop.
Systems Documentation: Foundational skills managing systems documentation.


Minimally Required Organizational Competencies:
Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights Services: Foundational knowledge of family planning and reproductive health principles, practices and services, including program strategies and indicators.
Languages: Ability to use English language in addition to a second language (French, Spanish or Portuguese)
Communication: Advanced oral and written communication skills.
Passion for Sexual and Reproductive Health: Demonstrated commitment to family planning, reproductive health services, gender, maternal, child health services, and eradication of harmful traditional practices.
Influencing: Ability to influence others at all levels within the organization.
Customer Service: Advanced customer service skills.
Organization, Planning and Multi-tasking: Advanced organizational and planning skills, project planning and management skills. Proven ability to set priorities, meet deadlines and multi-task with minimal supervision.

title: Information Technology
jobDescription:
The Microsoft 365 Support Engineer supports and administrates end-user adoption of SharePoint services. They work with an onshore SharePoint Administrator to ensure customer-facing product engineering support for issues are addressed in a timely manner.

Primary Duties Responsibilities

  • Troubleshoot and resolve Tier I and II problems and issues on the Microsoft 365 platform (SharePoint, OneDrive, MS Teams Yammer).
  • Utilize PowerShell to implement configuration changes that meet customer requirements.
  • Monitor, support, and upgrade third party services, applications, and web parts from other service providers.
  • Manage and address user support tickets in a timely fashion.
  • Create and support a knowledge base and self-service materials for the team and end-user consumption.
  • Perform site and site collection configuration, support, and maintenance for development, test, and production Microsoft 365 environments.
  • Amenable to a flexible work schedule, as the need arises, to ensure communication with onshore resources / customers.

Qualifications

  • Bachelors degree and 5+ years experience, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
  • At least 3+ years of hands-on system management experience with SharePoint 2013/16 and SharePoint Online.
  • Experience with 3rd party tools for server administration and maintenance including Sharegate and Cardiolog.
  • Working experience on SharePoint Search, Managed Metadata and Content Types.
  • Effective communication skills both orally and written.
  • Proficient writing PowerShell scripts for Microsofts 365 platform and Graph.
  • Keen attention to detail and focus on high quality deliverables.
  • Highly self-motivated and self-directed.
  • Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a dynamic, fast-paced and remote environment.
  • Working knowledge of Active Directory, networking and virtualization.
  • Working knowledge of helpdesk software such as FreshService used to maintain support tickets.
  • Ability to troubleshoot .Net, PowerShell, HTML, XML, C#, CSS preferred.
  • Working knowledge of JavaScript and modern JS frameworks preferred.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Microsoft 365 (SharePoint, MS Teams, Yammer, OneDrive for Business)
  • Self-starter
  • HTML/CSS/XML.
  • JavaScript, .Net, C#.
  • Power Platform.

title: Information Technology
jobDescription:
The Life Annuity Predictive Analytics (LAPA) business unit is a lean, agile, diverse, and geographically distributed data science startup that develops leading edge data products and deploys them on the cloud as web applications for the world s premiere life insurers.

As a Site Reliability Engineer, you will help in designing, developing, deploying, documenting, and maintaining our DevOps infrastructure and pipelines for web app data products.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Work collaboratively in an Agile/Scrum team with team members from various domains.
  • Provision and manage resources on cloud (Azure) and on-prem.
  • Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaC) for cloud resources.
  • Develop, own, and maintain CI/CD pipelines.
  • Support infrastructure and maintenance of production, QA, and dev environments
  • Maintain infrastructure documentation.
  • Implement infrastructure monitoring capabilities.
  • Contribute to new technology evaluation and continuous process improvement.

Required skills and knowledge:

  • 2+ years of DevOps/Site Reliability experience.
  • Awareness of critical concepts in DevOps and Agile principles.
  • Passion for technology, growth, self-motivated, energetic, organized, driven, and result oriented.
  • Ability to take initiative, ownership and work independently without a lot of supervision.
  • 1+ years of hands-on experience with at least one cloud provider (AWS, GCP or Azure).
  • Good troubleshooting competency including detailed knowledge in Networking, Protocols and Security.
  • Understanding of containerization and orchestration concepts such as Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Hands-on knowledge and experience with web application delivery through CI/CD with tools like Azure Devops, Gitlab etc.
  • Configuration and managing databases such as MySQL, Mongo etc.
  • Knowledge infrastructure as code with tools like Ansible, Terraform or others
  • Understanding of Linux and windows operating systems.
  • Programming and scripting experience (in any language, preferably Python or bash) is required
  • Bachelor s degree in computer science, engineering, or any other STEM field.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to work in a highly collaborative environment as well as independently with minimum supervision.

Preferred knowledge and experience:

  • Solid hands-on experience of Azure cloud services.
  • Understanding of python or R language.
  • Solid experience of DevOps tools like Git, Ansible, azure devops, Docker, Kubernetes, yaml pipelines, etc.

What we offer

  • Work with amazing team members having cross-functional expertise.
  • Great work culture, open to try new ideas and implement effective improvements.
  • Competitive compensation once in a life-time opportunity to expand your role and knowledge.

title: Information Technology
jobDescription:
• We are looking for an enthusiastic Junior Software Developer with a desire to grow their knowledge and experience as part of our dynamic Integrate team. You must be a passionate C# developer who is excited about using the best .NET Core has to offer to build cloud native solutions on Microsoft Azure.
  • You must also have an interest in insurance or financial markets .
  • The Integrate development environment is a cloud connected desktop application, built using Electron and .NET 5. The front end is written in TypeScript and React JS, which interoperates with the cloud services and legacy front end technology using a .NET service layer running on the user s desktop. The development environment allows users to build actuarial projections, data processes and reports.
  • The legacy front end components are developed in a mixture of WinForms and WPF, which is being migrated and simplified into the new user experience.
  • The cloud services are hosted in Azure, using AKS (Azure Kubernetes Service) and provide the following capabilities:
  • A model management solution for sharing models between users with the requisite permission model and access control.
  • A version control system for the data model which underpins the actuarial projection and ETL functionality. The semantic layer manages conflict resolution to simplify the merge experience, and we support rudimental branching and merging strategies.
  • A promotion pipeline for taking the developed artifacts into a test environment, and then on to production.
  • An execution environment for running actuarial models and ETL processes:
  • Orchestration engine for managing interactions of various financial projections and data processes
  • Hyper scale compute platform for running financial projections across the cloud
  • Big data platform for running ETL processes
  • Reporting platform for delivering insight from the model to end users
  • The legacy cloud components are hosted on Azure Cloud Services and are being containerized, modernized, and incorporated in a single SaaS platform deployed as microservices.

Responsibilities

Deliver industry-leading software with competitive cadence.

  • Collaborate in a team-focused, Agile development environment.
  • Ability to organize and self-direct to get things done.
  • Embrace technical excellence and continuous learning.
  • Contribute and adapt to changing requirements, ideas, and solutions.
  • Design and develop customer facing applications.
  • Write automated tests to cover all requirements and functionality.
  • Delivers small enhancements and bug fixes and collaborates with more senior members to deliver small features; works with team lead to prioritize work that is high impact while understanding and following team processes; escalates to team/lead when stuck
Qualifications and skills
  • Experience with Microsoft .NET 5+ using latest C#
  • Experience with ASP.NET (Core)
  • Experience with front-end technologies; JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, AngularJS
  • Strong willingness to learn and collaborate
  • Legacy Windows .NET UX technology: WinForms, WPF/Silverlight
  • Web build tools: Webpack, BabelJs, NPM, NodeJs Experience in finance or actuarial fields Experience with Azure DevOps Qualifications Skills You are using an unsupported browser.
  • To use this site, please use a supported browser.

title: Information Technology
jobDescription:
• As a Data Engineer on the LAPA team, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data pipelines using industry-leading cloud applications such as Databricks and orchestration tools such as Azure Data Factory.
  • You will use programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL to automate the ETL, analytics, and data quality processes from the ground up.
  • You will design and implement complex data models, metadata, build reports and dashboards, and own data presentation and dashboarding tools for the end users of our data products and systems.
  • You will work with leading edge technologies like Databricks, Azure Data Lake, Azure Data Factory, Snowflake, and more. You will write scalable, highly tuned SQL/Pyspark code running over millions of rows of data.
  • You will work closely with other data scientists, data engineers, software engineers/developers, and domain experts to continuously improve our data collection, data cleaning, data analysis, predictive modeling, data visualization, and application development. You will also investigate, evaluate, and present new technologies and processes for the team to use.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Develop data cleaning pipelines using Spark SQL/Pyspark on Databricks
  • Perform debugging and root cause analysis on data issues
  • Perform code reviews and establish test automation processes
  • Lead efforts to minimize technical debt
  • Support the design and development of a machine-learning framework on databricks
  • Support RD based activities related to predictive analytics and machine learning
  • Document analysis and modeling results. Help build good wikis related to data pipelines

Skills and Requirements:

Required skills :

  • 1+ years of experience in a data science/data engineering role
  • Experience with data modelling, ETL design, and using cloud data warehouses
  • Strong programming skills in Python
  • Software engineering skills for data science (Python, R)
  • Knowledge of Data Engineering and the respective tools and technologies (e.g., Apache Spark, Databricks, Python, SQL DB, Data Lake concepts)
  • Experience working with databases and SQL
  • Ability to work in a highly collaborative, Agile environment with a strong desire to learn
  • Ability to take ownership of a technical challenge and see it through to a successful conclusion
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Preferred skills and knowledge :

  • Experience with PySpark
  • Experience in ETL optimization, writing custom pyspark functions (UDFs) and tuning PySpark or Spark SQL code
  • Experience in using DAG orchestration with tools like Data Factory, Airflow, Prefect etc.
  • Experience in package management and writing custom Python packages.
  • Experience in handling data - data lineage, data governance, ensuring data quality, feature stores etc.
  • Knowledge of data engineering best practices and in using industry-standard methodologies.
  • Experience developing and applying statistical models and machine learning techniques
  • Advanced knowledge of web app development including JavaScript, CSS, and HTML

Required education :

  • BS degree (MS preferred) with a concentration in computing (e.g. Software / Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science)

title: Information Technology
jobDescription:
As a Sr. Technical support specialist, this professional will provide first-line triage and service desk support to internal users and clients. The right candidate will be highly motivated, a self-starter and capable of working independently. Strong written and verbal communication, attention to detail, and troubleshooting skills are necessary to be successful in this position. Key responsibilities will include the following:
  • Respond to and resolve help desk requests.
  • Application management. Learn all phases of various applications and work with technical support to resolve any related issues.
  • Assist in monitoring the system daily and respond immediately to security or usability concerns as it relates to IT operations.
  • Assist with upgrades to systems and processes as required for enhanced functionality and security issue resolution.
  • Provide technical support for servers and applicationss.
  • Identify, research and resolve technical problems in a timely manner.
  • Perform routine audits of systems and software.
  • Apply operating system updates, patches and configuration changes and do month end patching on the systems.
  • Follow and enforce security compliance standards and company policies.
  • Follow best IT practices to remain compliant with SOC2 and HITRUST audits.

Skills and Requirements

Candidates must be team players with excellent interpersonal skills. They must also have solid, proven experience in a help desk role. This position requires the following minimum requirements:

  • 3-5 years technical support experience.
  • 2-3 years Windows server support experience
  • Experience in working with teammates in an escalated role.
  • Direct experience in managing users and groups within Active Directory.
  • Excellent troubleshooting skills.
  • Experience with managing Windows servers.
  • Experience of working on a monitoring tool.
  • Ability to communicate clearly, verbally and in writing.

Though not required, the following skills would be beneficial:

  • Active Directory experience with more than 5,000 users.
  • Experience working in a regulated environment (HIPAA) would be beneficial
  • Basic knowledge of SQL servers would be beneficial.
  • Previous experience in a service desk solution involving ticketing software.
  • PowerShell scripting.
  • Experience in the following applications would be beneficial:
  • Nagios
  • ServiceDesk
  • Desktop Central
  • AD Manager
  • Basic knowledge of Azure cloud computing.

jobDescription:
• Work collaboratively in an Agile/Scrum team with team members from various domains.
  • Independently define and monitor quality assurance metrics for continuous quality process improvements.
  • Design, create and maintain testing frameworks.
  • Drive automation through Continuous Testing (CT) integration in our CI/CD pipelines.
  • Perform various kinds of testing on our platform, wherever relevant (Exploratory Testing, UI testing, Performance testing, Database testing etc.).
  • Maintain complete and relevant documentations throughout the SSDLC process.
  • Identify risks (software bugs, security risks), devise mitigation plans, and estimate efforts to meet project timelines.
  • Incorporate security testing (static code analysis, dynamic code analysis, interactive security testing, fuzz testing etc.) wherever .
  • Automation integration with cloud-based device environment.
  • Contribute to new technology evaluation and continuous process improvement.

Skills and Requirements:

Required :

  • 2+ years of SDET/Automation experience.
  • Prior experience in developing automation tools or frameworks to test web applications.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD tools.
  • Knowledge of documentation requirements at different stages of SSDLC.
  • Programming and scripting experience (in any language, preferably Python or bash) is required.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • BS degree in computer science, engineering, or any other STEM field.

Preferred :

  • Knowledge of Azure DevOps.
  • Experience with robot framework.
  • Knowledge of cloud platforms like Azure (preferred), AWS, GCP etc.
  • Good knowledge on the DevOps tools and processes.
  • Knowledge of basic information security requirements and security test tools.
  • Experience with SQL and databases.

Who should not apply

  • Candidates who are focused only on manual testing or only automated testing.
  • Candidates who have a narrow view of QA function and not open to consider business perspectives.

title: Information Technology
jobDescription:
• We are seeking an Operations Analyst to join our dynamic Integrate Operations and Support team. Our global Operations Team is second to none, and is united around a common task of providing world-class support and unparalleled uptime and reliability to our customer base.
  • In this role, you will be expected to provide front-line service, support, and incident management to our customer base, escalating issues as needed to senior team members, or our actuarial consulting, IT, and software development teams. You will participate in the monitoring and management of our cloud-based services and operational infrastructure, and will be expected to go the extra mile, doing whatever it takes to preserve uptime and ensure customer satisfaction.
  • The ideal candidate will have a background in Information Technology, and a strong desire to learn and support new systems, on the cutting edge of cloud-hosted software.
Who We re Looking For Responsibilities:
  • Provide front-line support to our SaaS customers, manage trouble tickets and respond via phone and email
  • Develop an in-depth working knowledge of MG-ALFA and Integrate applications
  • Provide resolutions or workarounds to support issues; escalate and coordinate issue resolution between our Operations and Software Development teams
  • Provide internal support to our implementation teams
  • Ops Lead Role, additional responsibilities. Provide mentorship for the rest of the Operation team Be a point of contact for escalations for internal and external customers Day to day management of the Operations team.
  • Provide feedback to Ops manager on Ops team performance and input into team members performance assessments
  • Leading by example, holding others to account.

Qualifications and Key Attributes:

  • 2-4 years of IT or operational support experience in a customer-facing role
  • Strong aptitude for new software and technology Strong focus on customer satisfaction Experience with Windows Server technologies
  • Willingness to participate in an on-call rotation, including periodic 247 coverage
  • Experience with Microsoft Azure, SaaS, PaaS, IaaS, or related technologies
  • Experience providing service and support as a member of a distributed operations team
  • Experience with virtualization technologies, such as Hyper-V or VMware Scripting experience (PowerShell, etc.)

title: Associate Vice President Information Technology
jobDescription:
Who are we?
PeopleStrong is Asia Pacifics leading, and the most comprehensive Human Capital Management SaaS platform. We
focus on delivering a unique employee experience, decisions that are driven by data-driven decision-making, and agility for
businesses.
What do we do?
We simplify the worklife of over 500 large enterprises across the emerging economies of Asia Pacific and empower the
lives of 2 million+ employees with a mobile-first, AI and ML-powered talent operating system. Our tech capabilities span
across the employee lifecycle from hire to exit, including Human Capital Management, Payroll, Talent Acquisition &
Management, and Collaboration.
Our Accomplishments
PeopleStrong is also rated among the Top 5 in the Asia Pacific at Gartners Peer Insights and voted as Customers Choice
of HR Tech in the Gartner Voice of Customer Report for 1000+ employee enterprises.
Purpose
We're here to bring joy, energy, & meaning to work.
Vision
In 5 years, we will be reading and writing to 10 million devices across HR managers and employees to help create a new
world of work.
Mission
We're on a mission to redesign work-life for tomorrow. We create digital platforms that enable companies and their
employees to collaborate in simple and delightful ways.




What role will you play?
AVP - IT
What will your job attributes include?
Internal Applications Management
Identify and discuss the need of business applications with all internal departments
Evaluate different products in the market, discuss with different vendor
Change management
I.T Operations:
Manage I.T operations
Contracts/ Vendor Management
Review all hardware and software acquisition and maintenance contracts, soliciting involvement and
participation of other management team members as appropriate.
Evaluate alternatives, performs appropriate cost benefit analysis, and recommends solutions that maximize
effectiveness and minimize costs commensurate with acceptable risks.
Manage relationships with vendors for sales, service and support of all information systems and technology.
Maintain problem logs, documenting system errors or defects.
System Administration / Reporting
Ensure that all information systems and networks operate according to the internal security standards,
regulatory agencies and legal requirements.
Develop and maintain the systems architecture, defining standards and protocols for data exchange,
communications, software and interconnection of information systems.
Coordinate and manage reporting needs and data analysis. Ensure that the gathering, processing, distribution
and use of pertinent information required by management to make decisions occur in a timely, accurate and cost
effective manner.
Oversee the linkage between external technology systems and the organizations IT resources; including
systems for electronic data exchange.
Oversee the development, maintenance, and communication of systems documentation, policies, and
procedures.
Information Security
Experience in defining and administering Information Security Policies
Knowledge of security standards like ISO 27001, SSAE 16.

Must have been involved in Security certifications / audits
Develop and maintain Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery Plans

  • Training
    Communicate IS/IT plans, policies and technology trends throughout the organization, including management
    groups and professional staff.
    Update documentation and on-line help facilities.
    What skills will help you succeed in this role?
    Essential
    The ideal candidate should have extensive experience in managing IT Infrastructure, Applications &
    Information Security -
    o Experience in managing both in house and outsourced IT Operations.
    o Familiarity with desktop, notebook, handheld, and server computer hardware.
    o Familiarity with local and wide area network design, implementation, and operation.
    o Familiarity with operating systems such as Windows, Unix, and Linux.
    o Knowledge of various office productivity software programs such as word processing, databases,
    spreadsheet programs, and communications software.
    o Knowledge of business processes and their interrelationship gained through three or more years of
    related experience.
    o Knowledge of Data Centre
    o Familiarity with Business Intelligence Solutions
    Demonstrated ability to
    o Relate to all levels of the user community
    o Be a team player that motivates and educates other team members
    o Plan, implement and support systems
    o Set and manage priorities
    o Comprehend complex, technical subjects
    o Translate technical language to lay audiences
    Education & Experience
    Essential
    1. B.E. / B.Tech / M.Tech / M.C.A / M.B.A degree from a recognized university in India (or foreign university
    recognized by the Association of Indian Universities)
    2. Should have at least one certification out of CCNA/ CCNP/ CCSP/ RHCE/ MCSE
    3. 6-8 years of work experience relevant to the job description
    4. Experience of leading IT teams
    Desirable
    1. Professional degree or certification related to elements of the job description
    2. Experience in managing one or more 3rd party certifications like ISO 27001, SSAE 16
    3. Experience in customer-facing roles
    https://www.peoplestrong.com/

title: Industry Analyst - Information & Communication Technology
tagsAndSkills: Data Modeling,primary research,strategy consulting,corporate training,business consulting,research analysis,market research,data collection
jobDescription:
Industry Analyst - Information & Communication Technology - Business Consulting Firm


Our client is a business consulting firm. It offers market research and analysis, growth strategy consulting, and corporate training.

Position vacant :

Designation : Industry Analyst-Emerging Technology

Experience - 5-10 years

Team: Information and Communication Technology (ICT) and/or Electronics

Qualifications & Experience :

- Bachelors in Engineering (CSC/IT/ECE/EEE)/ B.E along with up to 10 years of corporate experience or

- Any undergraduate with Masters/PG in Electronics, Communication, Mobile & Wireless specialization and at least 7-8 years of corporate experience or

- Bachelor in Electronics & Communication with PG Diploma/Masters in Business Management and at least 8-10 years of corporate experience

Job Focus :

- You will play a significant role understanding client's business issues, challenges and aspirations. We believe that your ability to deliver solutions to clients' problems will depend more on your talent, skills and real life business experience than just your degree.

- We are keen to employ people who care enough about a client's business problem, work hard to understand the underlying issues and accord priority to finding solutions to solve the problems. Here, your contributions will be as much important as our thought leadership and experience in supporting clients. In solving business problems there are many unknowns. We are seeking people who can see a way though unfamiliarity, make sense out of limited information and draw insights from ambiguity. This quality will be critical to drum up critical support both internal and external to push ideas, plans and recommendations.

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:

- Should have worked with market research firms in conducting primary research and gathering relevant data necessary for research within the ICT and/or electronics domain

- Should be aware of the positions taken on key issues in the ICT and/or electronics industry and should be adept in developing compelling content

- Organized team player with good sense of prioritization of time and multiple tasks

- Should ensure timely delivery of reports/analysis

- Excellent Oral & Written Communication Skills

- Flair for Creative Problem Solving; Logical Reasoning; Analytical Thinking; Strategic Thinking

- Good grounding in Microsoft Office Suite

- Exposure to Data Modeling using Frameworks, Management Models

- Should have good analytical skills and be aware of the different research methodologies in use

- Should ensure 100% data accuracy in each deliverable

- Comfortable to accommodate changes in work timings to suit global client expectations

- Knowledge of Foreign Language (Korean/ Japanese) would be an additional advantage

Profile Description:

Key Focus:

- Information and Communication Technology (ICT) and/or Electronics

- To continually track technology and product development trends in the ICT and/or electronics space, and to analyze and predict technology/ market trend

- Also, to identify strategic opportunities and critical success factors required to achieve business growth within the ICT and/or electronics industry

- Keep pace with technology developments, funding, partnerships, R&D focus areas, stakeholders in the tech innovation ecosystem

- Understand business implications of technology / product innovations and /or related initiatives

- Identify and evaluate industry best practices in technology / product innovations & technology leadership

Technology Domain: Cloud/ Networks/ Edge/ Wireless Technologies/Sensors/Semiconductor/Electronics

Profile Expectations:

- Mine, Analyze, Synthesize volumes of data towards addressing specific business objectives within technology / innovation management (such as Intellectual Property evaluation, R&D management, portfolio planning, technology valuation, technology forecasting, technology benchmarking, technology commercialization)

- Formulate technology roadmaps; recommend productization plan / new business opportunities

Profile Responsibilities:

- Data Collection through secondary and primary research (with corporates, academia, national research labs, investor communities etc.,)

- Contribution to technology news alerts, syndicated and/or custom technology reports, analyst briefings, media / press articles

- Proactively develop innovative and creative output based on interpretation and analysis that improves business performance and contribute to organizations goals and strategic intent

title: Software Engineer
jobDescription:
RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Maintain and enhance monitoring framework (data collection, alert aggregation, dashboarding) and Implement and enhance alerting logic (framework)

  • Enable proactive Incident alert and resolution leveraging knowledge scripts

  • Identify and detect repetitive incidents (stability, reliability) and develop solutions to fix problems.

  • Work on technical resolution for incidents and identify technical root cause

  • Ensure tool standards, Exploit tool capability to fine tune product reliability

  • Integrate incident, release, monitoring, alerting tools into overall ecosystem

  • Measure and report SLI, MTTx in periodic reviews, analyze deviations and take actions to closure

  • Update runbooks with changes to process / tools

  • Drive Postmortems to arrive at remedial actions.

  • Participate in On-Call Incident Technical Support

  • Ensure production release guidelines (entry/exit) and implementation are adhered to for changes to Production.

  • Support CI/CD pipeline implementation and integration to quality, security.

  • Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation; evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.

REQUIRED SKILLS

  • At least 5 years overall IT experience with 3 years in relevant area (DevOps / SRE).

  • Strong awareness and experience of working with Site Reliability Engineering principles.

  • Good understanding of public cloud offerings such as AWS components like EC2, IAM, RDS, Cloudwatch, Database (Redis, RDS, Dynamo DB).

  • Hands on experience on enterprise tools set such as Grafana, Instana, Prometheus, ELK Stack etc.

  • Has exposure to networking concepts (SSH, FTP, TCP/IP, DNS, Load balancing, CDN etc.).

  • Has experience in any scripting language (bash / python / perl).

  • Good experience with CI/CD pipelines including BitBucket, Jenkins

  • Experience operating high-availability, fault-tolerant, scalable, distributed software in production: building monitoring into your code, tweaking dashboards, defining alerts.

  • Knowledge of Agile software development principles including using JIRA.

  • Experience in 24/7 high availability production environment.

  • Excellent organizational, verbal and written communication skills.

  • Aptitude to be a good team player and the desire to learn and implement new technologies.

  • Knowledge of ITIL processes.

NICE TO HAVE

  • Experience with building Rest APIs, API Integration, and Web Services is preferred

  • Knowledge in Messaging and Streaming frameworks like - RabbitMQ / Kafka

  • Exposure to languages such as Typescript, Nodejs.

  • ITIL V4 Foundation certified.

title: NOC Engineer
tagsAndSkills: Network configuration,Linux,Business studies,Network monitoring,network services,Support services,Power supply,Troubleshooting
jobDescription:
1. To ensure maximum possible service availability and performance
2. To provide support services for Engineering and other technical teams
3. To provision customer network services on core equipment
4. These result in a highly diverse range of duties for the NOC our engineers are required to ensure they are fulfilled in a timely, cooperative and professional manner.
5. We interact frequently with technical support team so it s important that we are clear and concise in our communications. We also work very closely with the Engineering team and as such need to develop a good all-round understanding of systems and networks.
6. Diligence and attention to detail are also key skills along with an ability to multi-task and prioritize work appropriately.
7. We don t expect you to have all the required knowledge when you join us as many of these skills can be picked up through experience in the job, but those who do need to learn new skills must be prepared to spend time doing suitable research to ensure their grounding is thorough and properly understood. As your knowledge and confidence develop you may be asked to join our shift roster providing 24 7 support on our core infrastructure and services.
8. Importantly, NOC engineers must be eager and quick to learn, be clear communicators and must be able to use their initiative to tackle a broad range of problems.
9. Good monitoring and network diagnostic skills.
10. Basic Linux CLI skills.
11. Basic sysadmin skills.
12. Strong analytical skills and able to collate and interpret data from various sources.
13. Ability to assess and prioritize faults and respond or escalate accordingly.
14. Linux Network configuration and troubleshooting
15. Understanding of Traceroute path and finding the bad host
16. Basic Network Understanding and good knowledge of OSI layer
17. Experience of diagnosing network and service issues, following them through to resolution.
18. Understanding of different network device types like Switch, routers
19. Knowledge of Network link types like electrical and optical interface
20. Knowledge & understanding of Network device component failure like power supply failure
21. Basic understanding of network monitoring concepts and management tools.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENT

a) Good academic background with a degree or equivalent qualification in Information Technology, Business Studies, Computing or relevant subject.
b) Fresher or 6 12 months of experience in a Technical Support or similar role.
c) Clear communicator (both written and verbal).
d) Good technical or WIKI documentation skills.
e) Willing to learn and develop new skills.
f) Good self awareness. Actively seeks out tasks that help develop skills and knowledge.
g) Ability to work on own initiative. Actively seeks ways of improving existing systems and processes.
h) Can do attitude. Flexible and adaptable approach to problem-solving.
i) Cooperate with other teams.

jobDescription:
Senior Software Engineer- Omnichannel

Purpose:
Application support Maintains application support processes, and checks that all requests for support are dealt with according to agreed procedures. Uses application management software and tools to investigate issues, collect performance statistics and create reports.

Relationship management Implements stakeholder engagementcommunications plan. Deals with problems and issues, managing resolutions, corrective actions, lessons learned and the collection and dissemination of relevant information. Collects and uses feedback from customers and stakeholders to help measure effectiveness of stakeholder management. Helps develop and enhance customer and stakeholder relationships.

Is involved in recruiting process and proposes support for hiring decision and pre- selection of candidates Allocates the different work to the respective employees considering experience, complexity, workload and organizational efficiency Continuously monitors and evaluates team workload and organizational efficiency with the support of IT systems, data and analysis and team feedback and makes appropriate changes to meet business needs. Provides team membersdirect reports with clear direction and targets that are aligned with business needs and GIT objectives

Global IT Respective business function (GOPS, Finance, HR, Brand Marketing, WholesaleRetail) HR Management Controlling
